name: lanterns & mooncakes
description:
it's the mid-autumn festival, and the haul is looking good this year — surely it wouldn't make a dent if you sneaked by and got some ingredients so you could have some mooncake with your best friend?

---

use wasd or arrow keys to move and jump. (space and z also work for jump.)

---

this game was made for ludum dare 52, with the theme "harvest". i pulled at the theme, so harvest -> harvest festival -> mid-autumn festival -> lanterns & mooncakes!

hope you enjoy! feedback and criticisms welcome :)
